1246890.name: RPG Maker MV - Heroine Character Generator 5
1246890.description:
Heroine Character Generator 5 from Gee-kun-soft has arrived with the 5th collection of brand new parts for creating amazing heroine characters!

Heroine Character Generator 5 makes it easier than ever to create original female characters for your epic RPG project by offering more matching hairstyles, accessories, clothes and eye sets!

The more original characters you create, the more original your story becomes! So go ahead and get inspired with this new character generator!

Features:

* 91 Face graphics
* 84 SV Accessories and Clothing
* 103 Top View parts
* 84 TVD parts
* 47 Additional Variations
1246890.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
